title: ABC Nut Butter

preparations.content: Place almonds, Brazil nuts and cashews into mixing bowl and grind <b>30 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix <b>20 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix again <b>3 min/speed 5.5<b>. Serve immediately or store in an airtight jar in the refrigerator.

hintsAndTricks: ABC Nut Butter can be stored in the refrigerator in an airtight jar for up to one month.

Pre-soaking of nuts will enhance their digestibility. Prior to making recipe: place nuts in a non reactive bowl, covering with warm water and 1 tbsp salt. Soak for 7-24 hours. Drain and rinse nuts and place on a large baking sheet. Dehydrate in a low oven on proof mode or 150Â°F for 12-24 hours, turning once or twice. They are done when the nuts are crisp.
Replace with other types of nuts or a variety of nuts to find your favorite flavor combination.
Use roasted nuts for a stronger flavor.
